title: I’ll Be a Little Demon!
detail_text: <:th_ch0205/>Hey, Yoshiko, you stream games, right? Ai heard from Rinari!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>It’s not Yoshiko, it’s Yohane. Yeah, I do live streams. For the little demons who wish to hear the words of Yohane, it’s as addictive as the sweetest honey. I suppose it’s an oasis to those little demons who seek to immerse themselves in the world of Yohane.... Kukuku<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Can Ai be on your stream?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Hey! Are you even listening to me!? The world of Yohane and you aren’t a good match (Aishou), you know!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Even though my name is Ai~?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Don’t make a pun! See, that kind of atmosphere doesn’t fit well with the image of my streams! But if you really want to be on it.... Then you should also become a little demon!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Sure, Ai can be one. What should Ai do? Do we need bats or something?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Don’t do anything weird! You only need to be captivated by this Yohane. Lose yourself in my overflowing magical power....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Aah, then Ai might be able to do that. Ai can’t take my eyes off of Aqours’ lives after all! You have a special kind of charm when you’re performing, you know, Yoshiko~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Eh.... That’s not-! Argh! Fine! You can be on my stream!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
